patthana1.7:554.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.7:554.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:554.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—savitakkasavicārā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:555.1_0: Avitakkavicāramatto dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.7:555.1_1: **Sahajātā**—avitakkavicāramattā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vitakko cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:555.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:555.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vitakko ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:556.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.7:556.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaavicārā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:556.1_5: khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.7:556.1_9: kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu avitakkaavicārānaṁ khandhānaṁ vicārassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:556.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—avitakkaavicārā khandhā ca vicāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:557.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.7:558.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.

patthana1.7:558.1_2: **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu avitakkavicāramattānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.7:563.1_0: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—savitakkasavicāro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.7:569.1_0: Avitakkavicāramatto dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.7:569.1_1: **Sahajātā**—avitakkavicāramattā khandhā vicārassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:569.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattā khandhā vicārassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.7:569.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vitakko ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:571.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.7:571.1_1: **Sahajāto**—avitakkaavicāro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.7:571.1_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaavicāro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.7:571.1_5: khandhā vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.7:571.1_6: vicāro vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo, vatthu vicārassa atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.7:571.1_7: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.7:571.1_8: mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.7:571.1_14: **Purejātaṁ**—dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.7:571.1_15: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo, cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.7:571.1_17: Vatthu avitakkaavicārānaṁ khandhānaṁ vicārassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:571.1_18: **Pacchājātā**—avitakkaavicārā khandhā ca vicāro ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:572.1_0: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.

patthana1.7:630.1_0: Nahetuyā pañcatiṁsa, naārammaṇe pañcatiṁsa, naadhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa, naanantare pañcatiṁsa, nasamanantare pañcatiṁsa, nasahajāte ekūnatiṁsa, naaññamaññe ekūnatiṁsa, nanissaye ekūnatiṁsa, naupanissaye catuttiṁsa, napurejāte pañcatiṁsa, napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge pañcatiṁsa, nasampayutte ekūnatiṁsa, navippayutte sattavīsa, noatthiyā sattavīsa, nonatthiyā pañcatiṁsa, novigate pañcatiṁsa, noavigate sattavīsa.
patthana1.7:633.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekādasa, naadhipatiyā ekādasa, naanantare nasamanantare ekādasa, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye ekādasa, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge sabbe ekādasa, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte satta, nonatthiyā ekādasa, novigate ekādasa.
patthana1.7:636.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare pañcavīsa, samanantare pañcavīsa, sahajāte tiṁsa, aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa, nissaye tiṁsa, upanissaye pañcavīsa, purejāte pañca, pacchājāte pañca, āsevane ekavīsa, kamme ekādasa, vipāke ekavīsa, āhāre ekādasa, indriye ekādasa, jhāne ekavīsa, magge soḷasa, sampayutte ekādasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyā tiṁsa, natthiyā pañcavīsa, vigate pañcavīsa, avigate tiṁsa.
